The main color is a solid khaki tan that doesn't even match the slightly heathered camel sleeves, and the accent color is solid black... It makes the entire shirt look very cheap and not put together. The fit is great, which makes it even more of a bummer about the colors. 2 stars instead of 1 for the comfortable fit and structure.
